metadata.title: CVE-2022-0635 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Versions affected: BIND 9.18.0 When a vulnerable version of named receivesa series of specific queries, the named process will eventually terminatedue to a failed assertion check.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0635` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9-host - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9-libs - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9-utils - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
bind9utils - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
dnsutils - 1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:9.18.0-2ubuntu3').
